description: Retrieves statistics on the planning and execution of a query.

parameters.name: QueryId
parameters.description: The ID of the plan query operation.

nested_items.name: ExecutionStatistics
nested_items.description: An ExecutionStatistics structure containing execution statistics.

nested_items.name: AverageExecutionTimeMillis
nested_items.description: The average time the request took to be executed.

nested_items.name: DataScannedBytes
nested_items.description: The amount of data that was scanned in bytes.

nested_items.name: WorkUnitsExecutedCount
nested_items.description: The number of work units executed.

nested_items.name: PlanningStatistics
nested_items.description: A PlanningStatistics structure containing query planning statistics.

nested_items.name: EstimatedDataToScanBytes
nested_items.description: An estimate of the data that was scanned in bytes.

nested_items.name: PlanningTimeMillis
nested_items.description: The time that it took to process the request.

nested_items.name: QueueTimeMillis
nested_items.description: The time the request was in queue to be processed.

nested_items.name: WorkUnitsGeneratedCount
nested_items.description: The number of work units generated.

nested_items.name: QuerySubmissionTime
nested_items.description: The time that the query was submitted.
